fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Budget, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Communication, Migration and asylum
eu_initiatives:
Enhancing the value dimension of the EU. 
Promoting human rights, including freedom of religion or belief. 
Strengthening the social dimension of the EU, including combating poverty and social exclusion. 
Promoting ecological, economic and social sustainability.
organisation_name: Evangelical Lutheran Church of Finland, Church Council
section: V - Organisations representing churches and religious communities
subsection: Organisations representing churches and religious communities
membership:

Lutheran World Federation 
World Council of Churches
goals__remit:
The Church Council is in charge of the general administration, finance and activities of the Evangelical Lutheran Church of Finland. 
The aim of the work on EU Affairs is to monitor EU policies of relevance for the Church and coordinate advocacy work at both national and European level.
